catalog.description: Capstone course applying communication principles to internal and external publics; fact finding, planning, and evaluating social interrelationships; major campaigns for selected clients.
catalog.note: Students are expected to attend the first day of class; failure to do so may adversely affect grades.
catalog.prerequisite: Comms 425; software proficiency in Word, Excel, InDesign, Photoshop, and Premier are required. Strong understanding of social media platforms and analytic tools is also required.
catalog.recommended: Comms 360; experience with video and photo composition and editing are recommended.
catalog.title: Strategic Public Relations Campaigns.

course_headers.header_text: COMMS 485: Students are expected to attend the first day of class. Failure to do so may adversely affect your grade.
